name: BaBylissPRO® GoldFX+ All Metal Lithium Outlining Trimmer FX787NG
shortDescription: Premium all-metal lithium outlining trimmer with gold-tone finish

Equipped with a high-performance brushless engine for ultimate precision and power, this trimmer delivers exceptional cutting performance for detailed work and outlining.

name: BaBylissPRO® LimitedFX Silver Trimmer And Double-Foil Shaver Gift Set
shortDescription: Limited edition silver trimmer and double-foil shaver professional set
description: This exclusive BaBylissPRO® LimitedFX Silver Gift Set combines a premium outlining trimmer with a powerful double-foil shaver. Perfect for professionals seeking the ultimate grooming duo, this limited edition set features sleek silver metallic finish and includes everything needed for precision cutting and ultra-smooth finishing.

name: BaBylissPRO® X Tomb45® Wireless-Charging Trimmer
shortDescription: Revolutionary wireless-charging trimmer with Tomb45 technology
description: The BaBylissPRO® X Tomb45® Wireless-Charging Trimmer features groundbreaking wireless charging technology. Simply place on the charging dock for effortless power-up. This collaboration brings cutting-edge convenience to professional grooming with Ferrari-designed engine and precision-ground blades.

name: BaBylissPRO® X Tomb45® Wireless-Charging Clipper
shortDescription: Professional wireless-charging clipper with advanced Tomb45 technology
description: Experience the future of professional grooming with the BaBylissPRO® X Tomb45® Wireless-Charging Clipper. This revolutionary clipper combines powerful cutting performance with the convenience of wireless charging. Features a high-performance brushless motor and premium DLC fade blade for exceptional results.
features: DLC fade blade for precision cutting

name: BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Cord/Cordless Metal Double-Foil Shaver (Gold)
shortDescription: Premium double-foil shaver with luxurious gold finish
description: The BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Gold Double-Foil Shaver delivers the closest, smoothest shave possible. Featuring dual independent suspension foils with titanium-coated blades, this shaver provides exceptional cutting performance. The luxurious gold finish adds professional style to your toolkit.

name: BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Cord/Cordless Metal Double-Foil Shaver (Silver)
shortDescription: Professional double-foil shaver with sleek silver finish
description: The BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Silver Double-Foil Shaver combines cutting-edge technology with timeless style. Dual suspension foils work independently to capture and cut hair at skin level for an ultra-smooth finish. Perfect for professional barbershops and personal grooming.

name: BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Cord/Cordless Metal Double-Foil Shaver (Black)
shortDescription: Classic black double-foil shaver for professional results
description: The BaBylissPRO® FOILFX02™ Black Double-Foil Shaver offers professional-grade performance in a sleek black finish. Dual independent foils deliver the smoothest shave possible, while the powerful motor ensures consistent results. Ideal for finishing work and creating clean lines.

name: BaByliss PRO UVFOIL Gold Double Foil Cordless Shaver
shortDescription: Premium gold cordless shaver with UV sanitizing case
description: The BaBylissPRO® UVFOIL Gold Shaver takes hygiene to the next level with an included UV sanitizing case. This premium double-foil shaver features independent suspension foils and a powerful motor for ultra-smooth results. The luxurious gold finish adds professional elegance.

name: BaByliss PRO UVFOIL Rose Gold Double Foil Cordless Shaver
shortDescription: Elegant rose gold shaver with UV sanitizing technology
description: The BaBylissPRO® UVFOIL Rose Gold Shaver combines beauty with hygiene. Features an elegant rose gold finish and includes a UV sanitizing case that kills 99.9% of bacteria. Dual foils deliver an incredibly smooth shave, making it perfect for discerning professionals.

name: BaBylissPRO® LithiumFX Cord/Cordless Lithium Ergonomic Clipper
shortDescription: Ergonomic lithium clipper for all-day professional use
description: The BaBylissPRO® LithiumFX Clipper features an ergonomic design that reduces hand fatigue during extended use. Powered by a high-torque brushless motor and equipped with a precision-ground fade blade, this clipper delivers professional results with exceptional runtime.

name: BaBylissPRO® LithiumFX+ Limited Edition Grey Cord/Cordless Lithium Ergonomic Clipper
shortDescription: Limited edition grey ergonomic clipper with enhanced features
description: The BaBylissPRO® LithiumFX+ Limited Edition Grey Clipper features an exclusive grey finish with enhanced performance features. This special edition combines the proven LithiumFX ergonomics with upgraded components for even better cutting performance and extended runtime.

name: BaBylissPRO® COREFX Clipper
shortDescription: Professional core performance clipper for everyday use
description: The BaBylissPRO® COREFX Clipper delivers reliable professional performance at an exceptional value. Featuring a powerful motor and precision blade, this clipper is designed for daily professional use. Perfect for barbershops and stylists who demand consistent results.

name: BABYLISSPRO® COREFX HAIR TRIMMER
shortDescription: Professional core performance trimmer for precision detailing
description: The BaBylissPRO® COREFX Professional Performance Trimmer is designed for precision detailing and outlining work. Features a powerful motor and precision-ground T-blade for clean lines and detailed work. Ideal for professional barbershops and experienced stylists.

name: BaBylissPRO COREFX Professional Performance Double Foil Shaver
shortDescription: Professional core performance double-foil shaver
description: The BaBylissPRO® COREFX Professional Performance Double Foil Shaver delivers smooth, close shaves with dual independent foils. Perfect for finishing work and creating ultra-clean lines. Features a powerful motor and extended battery life for all-day professional use.

description: The StyleCraft Pro Instinct Trimmer combines vector motor technology with intuitive torque control for unmatched precision and power. name: Wahl 5 Star Cordless Magic Clip Clipper #8148 (Dual Voltage)
shortDescription: Classic 5 Star Magic Clip cordless clipper for professionals

name: Wahl 5 Star Cordless Senior Clipper #8504-400 (Dual Voltage)

name: Wahl Super Taper X Cord/Cordless Clipper #3026468 (Dual Voltage)
shortDescription: Next-generation Super Taper with cord/cordless versatility

name: WMARK NG-SM003 Mini Fascia Gun Massage Device
